Author: ProvocativeSkeleton
Text: It’s so hard to just “let go” but sometimes it’s possible and it feels amazing, like last week where I went “I’m not eating for 5 days” (Monday-Friday) then suddenly Thursday comes around and I’m like “I don’t *have* to fast, I don’t *have* to restrict myself or have limits it’s okay if I don’t follow them” and I suddenly felt better and less pressure.   Yesterday was my designated “eat whatever you want day” and I was getting full, instead of that voice saying “you have to finish it all” I just said “nah, I had enough” and threw it away.   Little wins like that really help me

Author: kmthyn95
Text: I wish I could feel it more often. It barely happens to me but when it does, I’m grateful. I never want to let go.  Please take care and be well. We can get through this together💗
